commit message: Moved the todo list to the project wiki
Refactored things to reduce complexity. No more GPS Listener dedicated class and GPSStatus custom bean. Must be tested, though...

Introduced a Intent-base communication between Activity and Service to reduce complexity, and prepare backgrounding of service.
Some minor changes in preferences UI.

First attempt to have the service work in background when user quits UI. Works, but lacks a notification system.
Preferences screen now display the values of preferences.
Incremented version number.
Bug corrections, minor UI changes, and first attempt to backgrounding the GPS logger service.
